page.title: 10TRADE IN GREAT LUMLEY.
page.content: Most everyday needs can be bought at the local shops, which include three take-away food shops; a Chinese take- away, the "Windsor Chippy" and hot snacks from the Bakery. You can hire video tapes from Coland's and Tindale's, which are also general dealers.The newsagent sells cigarettes books and sweets.Alice's is a new shop which sells clothes and items unavailable elsewhere.There is also a greengrocer's, a pharmacy linked to the doctor's surgery and a garage with forecourt. Two local dairymen deliver milk and dairy produce. There is a Co-op. and travelling shops to serve the community. It is a short bus ride to Chester-le-Street for a wider selection of shops, with more competitive prices. {S.Hughes.
